mapper.insert: insert into articles(bm_seq, title, contents, writer, isNotice, isComment) VALUES (#{bm_seq}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{isNotice}, #{isComment})
mapper.select: select count(seq) from articles where isNotice = 0 and isDelete = 0
select * from articles where isNotice = 1 and isDelete = 0 order by seq desc
